title: #407: Talking To Thoth On Mushrooms In The Simulation with  Shawn Beaupre
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode I welcome Spiritual Warrior Shawn Beaupre to the show to discuss his journey to a higher state of awareness and the wise words Thoth gave him to help him understand his purpose in this simulation! Thank you so much for your support!

Please check out Shawn Beaupre's internet:
Instagram: https://instagram.com/beaups72?igshid=6700rs9bvhmg
